INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the plasma concentrations and of the effectiveness of the corticoids due to increase of their hepatic metabolism by the inducer: the consequences are particularly great in patients with Addison’s disease treated with the hydrocortisone and in the case of organ transplants.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical and biological monitoring; adjustment of the dosage of the corticoids during the treatment with the inducer and after it is stopped.
